com.thoughtworks.go.plugin.api.material.packagerepository

Interface PackageMaterialPoller


  • public interface PackageMaterialPoller
    PackageMaterialPoller encapsulates all methods which are required to communicate with package repository.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result checkConnectionToPackage(PackageConfiguration packageConfiguration, RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration)
      Checks if the package with the given configuration is available in the repository.
      Result checkConnectionToRepository(RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration)
      Checks if the repository with the given configuration is accessible.
      PackageRevision getLatestRevision(PackageConfiguration packageConfiguration, RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration)
      Gets the latest modification for the given package and repository configuration
      PackageRevision latestModificationSince(PackageConfiguration packageConfiguration, RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration, PackageRevision previouslyKnownRevision)
      Gets the latest modification for the given package and repository configuration since later than the last known revision by GO.

    • Method Detail

      • getLatestRevision

        PackageRevision getLatestRevision(PackageConfiguration packageConfiguration,
                                RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration)
        Gets the latest modification for the given package and repository configuration
        Parameters:
        packageConfiguration - package configuration for which latest modification should be fetched
        repositoryConfiguration - repository configuration which contains package configuration
        Returns:
        PackageRevision for the latest modification

      • latestModificationSince

        PackageRevision latestModificationSince(PackageConfiguration packageConfiguration,
                                      RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration,
                                      PackageRevision previouslyKnownRevision)
        Gets the latest modification for the given package and repository configuration since later than the last known revision by GO.
        Parameters:
        packageConfiguration - package configuration for which latest modification should be fetched
        repositoryConfiguration - repository configuration which contains package configuration
        previouslyKnownRevision - last known revision by GO
        Returns:
        PackageRevision for the modification since last known revision by GO

      • checkConnectionToRepository

        Result checkConnectionToRepository(RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration)
        Checks if the repository with the given configuration is accessible.
        Parameters:
        repositoryConfiguration - repository configuration for which connectivity should be checked
        Returns:
        Result of connection check

      • checkConnectionToPackage

        Result checkConnectionToPackage(PackageConfiguration packageConfiguration,
                              RepositoryConfiguration repositoryConfiguration)
        Checks if the package with the given configuration is available in the repository.
        Parameters:
        packageConfiguration - package configuration for which connectivity should be checked
        repositoryConfiguration - repository configuration which contains package configuration
        Returns:
        Result of connection check
